Gra mega. Siadłem do niej wieczorem, a od komputera odszedłem rano.... 2 dni potem. Jeśli trafimy na dobrego zabójcę, to skończymy na haku już po chwili od rozpoczęcia naszej walki o życie. Tytuł, do którego naprawdę trzeba wielu godzin, aby grać jak profesjonalista. Jako survivor musimy uniknąć powieszenia na haku przez zabójcę i naprawić generatory, aby potem móc uciec, jako killer nie możemy doprowadzić do ich ucieczki. System z perkami, które ułatwiają późniejszą grę wydaje się być dopracowany, umila grę, a dodatkowo zachęca do spędzenia większej ilości godzin, aby zdobywając kolejne, mieć większą przewagę nad przeciwnikiem.

Gra wyśmienita, warta swojej ceny, perełka!

Nervenkitzel pur..
auch wenn man das Spiel schon mehrere Stunden gespielt hat, ist man doch immer sehr nervös als Überlebender die Generatoren zu reparieren oder irgendwo versteckt zu sitzen und zu hoffen, dass der Killer einen nicht findet. 
Das einzige nervige sind solche Leute, die meinen sie müssen unbedingt an den Haken campen wo sie ihre Opfer aufhängen, dadurch geht einiges an Spielspaß verloren. Aber dafür können ja in erster Linie die Entwickler nichts. Es wird ja auch schon dagegen gearbeitet. 
Im Großen und Ganzen ist es jedoch ein sehr gutes Spiel, welches vorallem am Abend im Dunkeln sehr viel Spaß macht.
非常好

Okay i have nearly 300 hours in this game bought the game and every dlc for a friend as well. He and i played the game together a good amount but he was getting tired of the bugs the camping and the survivors and killer exploits. I kept playing the game and Then one day i had enough of the game myself and just stopped playing and a month later here I am playing the game thing it will be fun again that maybe some of the things are fix not as many campers so on and so forth. Heck no played 10 games and 9/10 of those games face campers last guy wasn't even there to play.

I can't recommend this game i know i have nearly 300 hours in this game but most of it is from when the first month it was out. The art is great charaters look great love the music but the balance in the game is so far of that there isn't even a scale to help me describe it. Ranking in the game there is no such thing you'll have brad new killer maybe 3 hours in going up against prestiage 3 survivors or vise versa fro brand new survivors. The salt in the game from both side killer and survivor is really bad. my freind made a disccusion that said if i remember correctly "the salt in this game is so bad that i feel like im playing Call of Duty" about two days went by and there i think nearly a hundred comments on there of people agreeing with him all and all really good people fast foward 2 hours one of the people from Dead by Daylight came in and said this discussion isn't help anyone only making things worse "Now mind you there was not hateful things going on in there jutst nice poeple agreeing and telling there exprences and he closes it. Good job Dead by Daylight Please get ya'll some glasses or get new ones cause ya'll need them.

In the end I'll give you a break down of what this game is today Okay here you go:

Good art nice music good design.
bugs that haven't been fixed and probably never will fix
Campers, Cheater, Exploits, and so much salt that it makes Call of Duties lobbies look Sodium Free
Matches are becoming harder to find evn more so if you want one with respectable player and no salty at the end.


If you do still want to get this game please wait till it goes on sale because one of two may happen 
1. you'll buy the game play for a hour realise what the game is and refund it 
2. you'll use your money to buy something else and save your self the misery.


p.s. will no longer be playing this game unless fixes are made. good luck Dead by Daylight.

Dead by Daylight это игра которая хорошо заставляет игрока играть в команде даже если вы не можете с ними общаться, происходит вопрос, что будет если не играть в команде? Ответ очень легкий, вас ждет крюк. Какие задачи у обеих сторон? У 4 выживших есть задача сбежать, но для этого они должны отремонтировать 5 генераторов убегая от убийцы и в конце открыть ворота, а задачей убийцы является поймать выживших и повесить на крюки каждый выживший может быть на крюке только 2 раза в 3 раз это уже Game Over, для того чтобы предотвратить это цикл вам всего лишь нужно помогать друг другу, особенностями игры являются персонажи и их перки каждый персонаж уникален начиная с выживших и заканчивая до убийцы. (P.S имеются DLC в виде персонажа и одежд, в игре имеются баги) 10/10 баллов

As of January 7, 2017 the gameplay itself is great, but its matchmaking system is a complete failure. I'm not talking about who gets paired with who (which is also an issue). I'm talking about whether or not it will even pair you up with ANYONE. It bugs out more than half of the time and kicks you back into the player menu.

Another issue is that you're lucky to find a decent match where all four survivors load into the map where you can finally play. It takes ages to load into a match sometimes after you've been paired up with everyone too.

If you go to join a public lobby through matchmaking (your only option), sometimes the game glitches and sits on the loading screen forever. You have to kill the game's .exe process and reboot it if you want to try and play again.

If you're playing with friends, you need to manually invite them again after each match. It kicks everyone back to their player menu after each match.

It's truly a shame to see such a great game go to waste if the developers don't pick up on these obvious flaws. Otherwise, the gameplay is great and the game itself is fine once you load into a map. Currently, I do not recommend this to friends until the developers fix these issues.

***EDIT*** Septemeber 27, 2017 ***EDIT***
Wow! A developer actually listened to their community and fixed their game for the most part! I mean it too. The game is much better now, and it's much more playable now! I recommend this game now.
很容易上手 好玩
非常不错的游戏，游戏的规则和玩法都非常新颖。

~Edit

I changed my review from positive to negative because of a few major reasons. First playing killer is VERY unbalanced and survivors can easily abuse multiple features. Flashlight spamming, pallet dropping, body blocking. On top of all that survivors can fix generators so quick they win most games in under 5 minutes. Let me paint a picture of how most games go as a killer.

You start the match, look for a survivor, maybe find one chase him hit him, if your lucky he dosnt get away. *ding generator fixed* You follow him or find him again, smack him again down him pick him up. * ding generator fixed* you move him to a hook asap so he dosnt wiggle out, hook him, *ding generator fixed* you camp the hook if your a cheap broken noob to get that 1 measly kill but if you have any kind of skill you will go after another survivior. *ding 2 generators fixed and your hooked guy is probably rescued* Now they just need to get out through the gates. You will probably get a few hits on them as they try to open the gates but still. And that not even if they are playing SWF (Survive with friends.) which is game breaking for something like this and nothing has been done about it. 

Now playing a survivor is cake, its so easy its not even fun. 99% of the time i find a generator, fix it, someone gets hooked maybe, or i get hooked. I go to save them or fix another gen, someone fixes the remaining 3, and boom were out of there in under 5 minutes. The only time i ever die is when the killer camps the hook. 

So this game just needs to be totally redone, make it harder for survivors, make it so they cant abuse features and make it impossible for the killer to win, and do something about SWF.

Even though what I'm about to write might not suggest it - I do actually really recommend Dead By Daylight, in the hopes that all the bugs are eventually fixed.

This game is amazing - when everything goes right. If you land in a game where everyone is a similar level, you don't have a camper for a killer (benefical for the other survivors perhaps, but not in the spirit of good gameplay - morals people!) and everyone is in it for a good game, and not for hoarding points. 

I've been lucky enough to have quite a few of these games - and it is amazing. You are tense as soon as the music starts, your heart pounds along with the heartbeat you hear, you are genuinely terrified when the killer appears (Nurse is freaking scary!). The four survivors work as a team, saving each other from the hook and healing each other - the killer is creeping around, scaring the Bejesus out of you. It doesn't matter who wins - the victor(s) are congratulated and 'good game' is heartily concurred all round.

But be ready - because that is what I get maybe 20% of the time, and it's only that 20% and the hope that the bugs will be fixed that keeps me coming back. The other 80%? I'm lucky if I get in a game, usually it fails to get me in a lobby. Once I am eventually into a game, I last 2 minutes tops because the killer is top level with all the best perks (and it's no fault of their own that they've been paired with such a low leveller like me) but really, they should be playing with gamers of their own standard, Survivors who have reached the top level. It's a common complaint, and one that I hope will be fixed soon. How can we Survivors level up when paired with a killer who can see us a mile away?! Otherwise, I am paired with a killer of a similar level but once caught and hooked - they camp. I've had people who don't even hide it and stand there watching me die, I had someone doing something similar to a figure of 8 around my hook tonight! But I don't think there's anything that the devs can do about that - you just have to hope that you've got a decent killer!

Once the bugs are fixed - this will be an outstanding game! Right now - yes, buy it but play it with friends, or have enough patience to deal with not getting into a lobby for a while, and possibly dealing with mismatched levels or camping killers when you get there. I haven't played as a killer yet, but I've already read stories about Survivors acting like tools but that's the risk of playing online. Eventually though you will get a match which shows the potential of this game.

Also enjoyed watching my OH jumping at every little noise tonight - thanks devs!

Es ist quasi eine sehr krasse Form von Versteckfangen. Es macht alleine ohne hin schon mehr als genug Spaß, sowohl als der "Killer" als auch als "Survivor". Keine Runde ist wie die andere, auch das Matchmaking System wurde drastisch verbessert, was zu deutlich kürzeren Suchzeiten und zu fairer aufgeteilten Spielen führte (Eigener Rang im vergleich zu dem der Mitspieler). Und durch den Survive-with-friends Lobby-Suchmodus ist jede Menge spaß vorprogrammiert. An sich ein sehr gelungenes Spiel vom Entwicklerteam. Einziger Mangelpunkt ist der, das nach dem "Last Breath" Kapitel jede weitere Erweiterung kostenpflichtig war (Kostümpacks außen vor).
Also 4 von 5 Möglichen Horrorspiel Sternen!
